Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 408th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2015, off Barry Sechrist (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2015, off Dion Granados (MON)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $635,714 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 6/11/2016.
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 4/11/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $1,064,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 5/21/2017.
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/11/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $1,270,000 per year...
8/14/2020: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $1,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
